exposurecontrol: Manual Exposure, Program Shift, Safety Shift, AE Lock
shootingcapacity: Approx. 350 shots using LCD monitor, Approx. 770 shots when LCD monitor is off
lcdmonitor: 3.0-inch TFT Color LCD with wide viewing angle, Approx. 922,000 dots
shutterspeed: 1-1/4000 sec., 15-1/4000 sec. (in Tv and M modes)
builtinflash: Auto, Flash On, Slow Synchro, Flash Off
whitebalance: Auto, Daylight, Cloudy, Tungsten, Fluorescent, Fluorescent H, Flash, Underwater, Custom 1, Custom 2
